verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> (not <S%G3756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>),
and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> who are <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> to the assemblies <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia: <S%G1053><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> he might deliver <S%G1807><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G1764><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>â€”
to whom <S%G3739><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I marvel <S%G2296><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you are <S%G3346><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> quickly <S%G5030><s%> deserting <S%G3346><s%> him <S%G575><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> "good news <S%G2098><s%>";

and <S%G3739><s%> there <S%G2076><s%> isn't <S%G3756><s%> another <S%G1487><s%> "good news. <S%G3361><s%>" Only there are <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> trouble <S%G5015><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> want <S%G2309><s%> to pervert <S%G3344><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> should preach to you <S%G5213><s%> any <S%G2097><s%> "good news" other than <S%G3844><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we preached <S%G2097><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> let him be <S%G2077><s%> cursed. <S%G331><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> we have said before, <S%G4280><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G3004><s%> now <S%G737><s%> say again: <S%G3825><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man preaches to you <S%G5209><s%> any <S%G2097><s%> "good news" other than <S%G3844><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which you received, <S%G3880><s%> let him be <S%G2077><s%> cursed. <S%G331><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> am I <S%G3982><s%> now <S%G737><s%> seeking the favor <S%G3982><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> am I striving <S%G2212><s%> to please <S%G700><s%> men? <S%G444><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G302><s%> were still <S%G2089><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> I <S%G302><s%> wouldn't <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2252><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I make known <S%G1107><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> concerning <S%G3588><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2097><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> did I <S%G1473><s%> receive <S%G3880><s%> it <S%G846><s%> from man, <S%G444><s%> nor was I <S%G1473><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> it came to me through <S%G1223><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you have heard of <S%G191><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> way of living <S%G391><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2454><s%>' religion, how that <S%G3754><s%> beyond <S%G2596><s%> measure <S%G5236><s%> I persecuted <S%G1377><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ravaged <S%G4199><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

I <S%G2532><s%> advanced <S%G4298><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2454><s%>' religion beyond <S%G5228><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of my own age <S%G4915><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> countrymen, <S%G1085><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> more exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> for the traditions <S%G3967><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> fathers. <S%G3862><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> it was the good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>'s womb, <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> me through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%>

to reveal <S%G601><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me, <S%G1698><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might preach <S%G2097><s%> him <S%G846><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> I didn't <S%G3756><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> confer <S%G4323><s%> with flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%>

nor <S%G3761><s%> did I go up <S%G424><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> those who were <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> away into <S%G1519><s%> Arabia. <S%G688><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G3825><s%> I returned <S%G5290><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I went up <S%G424><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to visit <S%G2477><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stayed <S%G1961><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> fifteen <S%G1178><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> of the other <S%G2087><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> I <S%G1492><s%> saw no one, <S%G3756><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> the <S%G80><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>'s brother. <S%G80><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> about the things which <S%G3739><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I <S%G3756><s%>'m not <S%G3754><s%> lying. <S%G5574><s%>
Then <S%G1899><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Syria <S%G4947><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cilicia. <S%G2791><s%>

I <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> still unknown <S%G50><s%> by face <S%G4383><s%> to the assemblies <S%G1577><s%> of Judea <S%G2449><s%> which were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2258><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> heard: <S%G191><s%> "He <S%G3754><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> preaches <S%G2097><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he once <S%G4218><s%> tried to destroy. <S%G4199><s%>"
And <S%G2532><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>
